data.title: The Passionate Fashionista
data.meta_description: Posts about The Lumineers written by Hayley Kornman
data.text:
The Road To Happily Ever After…

FORMER LOVERS

Reynolds and his wife of two years, Scarlett Johansson, filed for divorce in 2010. Relax, Blake had nothing to do with it.

BEING WITH LEO

The actress was previously romanced by actor Leonardo DiCaprio before the couple called it quits in October 2011.

KISSING COSTARS

Rumors that the Green Lantern costars’ romance started swirling after being seen at multiple spots together back in October 2011.

The Green Lantern

EARLY MORNING APPEARANCE

Their rumored relationship started gaining heat after Blake was spotted leaving his apartment early in the morning.

BIRTHDAY SURPRISE

Blake set up a surprise for her (at the time) kinda boyfriend’s birthday by sending her dog, Penny, out to visit him on the set of R.I.P.D. in Boston with a bunch of balloons!

PDA FEST

These two couldn’t keep their hands off each other—can you blame them?

WORKIN’ UP A SWEAT

These two motivate each other to stay fit by being workout buddies.

UNDER ONE ROOF?

Rumors started spreading that the couple had been looking for a home to share, but sources told E! News that it was only for Blake.

GOD BLESS AMERICA

Reynolds and Lively spent their Fourth of July enjoying some fun in the sun with the actress’ family.

WEDDING RUMORS

Just a few months ago, word started spreading that these two had already swapped vows, but it turned out to be untrue.

SORRY BOYS,

As of September 9, 2012 Blake is TAKEN

(Trust Me, You Don’t Want to Take On Ryan Reynolds)

Congratulations Mr. and Mrs. Ryan Reynolds

“A Secret Wedding”

(mock wedding invite)

MR. AND MRS. ERNIE LIVELY invite you to

CELEBRATE THE MARRIAGE

of their daughter

BLAKE CHRISTINA

to

RYAN RODNEY

REYNOLDS

9. september. 2012

half past five in the evening

Boone Hall

PLANTATION Mount Pleasant, South Carolina

dinner & dancing to follow

Blake Lively & Ryan Reynolds’ Wedding:

Inside The Ceremony

(source E! Online)

Their Wedding Reception Was Straight Out of The Notebook:

No, we didn’t confuse Ryan Reynolds and Ryan Gosling just then. But Boone Hall Plantation was used as the summer home of Allie (Rachel McAdams) in the 2004 film The Notebook.

Boone Hall Plantation

The Ceremony

Reception Hall

Reception

It Was Small but Star-Studded:

Around 60 guests reportedly attended the intimate ceremony, but it still had some Hollywood glitz. Blake’s Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants costars America Ferrera, Alexis Bledel and Amber Tamblyn were in attendance. Chapman, Louboutin and Schwartz were all on the guest list.

Florence Welch Performed

The bride’s friend Florence Welch (of Florence + the Machine) performed

“The Honeymooners:

A source told E! News that “the newlyweds stayed in South Carolina and have yet to embark on a honeymoon, but planned to do so later that month.” They were spotted out in Charleston later that week. According to local radio station 95.1, there have been “quite a few sightings of Ryan and Blake in Charleston over the past three months.” The couple has been seen “going to restaurants on King’s Street and have become somewhat regulars in the area.”

Said “I Do” Designer Style

Per Martha Stewart Weddings (who had exclusive coverage of the event) Blake said “I do” in a custom Marchesa gown by Georgina Chapman, while Ryan wore a Burberry tuxedo.Christian Louboutin designed the bride’s shoes, and the couple’s rings were designed by jeweler Lorraine Schwartz.

Georgina Chapman of Marchesa

Nice Tux Ryan

Blake and Christian Louboutin

Blake’s Wedding/Engagement Ring

***Their southern wedding was featured in the December issue of Martha Stewart Weddings.***

Real Weddings: Blake and Ryan, Charleston, South Carolina

Martha Stewart Weddings

Martha and Blake

Blake and Ryan

Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds are no strangers to a sea of cameras aimed at them. But when they decided to marry, they wanted to celebrate in privacy—and in style. And while they remain protective of images of them on their most heartfelt occasion, they graciously let us share pictures of the elements we created together.

The Gown

Blake’s cloudlike silk tulle gown featured a fitted bodice, illusion crystal beading on the shoulders, and rose-gold embroidery. Jeweler Lorraine Schwartz forged Ryan and Blake’s wedding bands.

The Bouquet

Weddings‘ style director Kate Berry created Blake Lively’s lush bouquet of pink jasmine, andromeda, dusty miller, and blushing bride hydrangea. She dipped select petals in subtle rose-gold glitter to play up the embroidery of the same color on the bride’s couture ballgown by Marchesa.

The Dessert Table

An avid cook, crafter, and baker, Blake envisioned an abundant dessert table overflowing with their favorite treats. The focal point was their vanilla-and-sour-cream wedding cake with peach-apricot preserves and Earl Grey-milk chocolate buttercream made by Maggie Austin Cake in Alexandria, Virginia.

Their Wedding Cake

Sweet Tooth

The lavish dessert table featured:

S’mores Bars by Bakehouse Charleston

Espresso Beans from Nuts.com.

Mini Blueberry Cheesecake Tartlets by Caviar & Bananas in Charleston

Tiny Lemon Tartlets with meringue toppings by Caviar & Bananas in Charleston

Fruit Jellies Various “Pates de Fruits” fromLa Maison du Chocolat

Little Cakes mini strawberry shortcakes by Caviar & Bananas in Charleston

-Source: Martha Stewart Weddings

Congratulations Blake & Ryan

BREATHTAKING

Love this picture

Someday…I’ll Get My Own Happy Ending

And He Will Say…

“I Belong With You,

You Belong With Me,

You’re My Sweetheart.”

-The Lumineers

BUT Until Then I’ll Live Vicariously Through Blake & Ryan

XOXO
